short_summary: The Science and Research branch of Health Canada requires the services of a Contractor to produce an annual consumer report on commercially available electronic radon testing devices, to conduct a short study about the placement protocol for radon testing devices, and to make recommendations for testing in multi-unit residential buildings in Canada.
description: Health Canada requires the services of the Contractor to produce an annual consumer report on commercially available electronic radon testing devices, to conduct a study about the placement protocol for radon testing devices, and to make recommendations for testing in multi-unit residential buildings in Canada. Health Canada will use the information to review testing guidelines, recommendations and protocols.
